abstract: Cisco Systems‘ chief development officer, Charles H. Giancarlo, widely seen as a top candidate for chief executive, announced on Thursday that he was quitting the company, leaving the race for leadership wide open.
lead_paragraph: Cisco Systems‘ chief development officer, Charles H. Giancarlo, widely seen as a top candidate for chief executive, announced on Thursday that he was quitting the company, leaving the race for leadership wide open.

headline.main: Senior Executive Is Leaving Cisco Systems
